```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
	echo = FALSE,
	message = FALSE,
	warning = FALSE
)
library(htmltools)
library(htmlwidgets)
library(leaflet)
library(leaflet.extras)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)


# Load data
df <- read.csv("data/alternative_trails_data.csv") %>%
  mutate(
    cagegory = as.factor(category),
    popup_url = paste0(
       "<h3><a href='", url,"' target='_blank'>", name, "</a></h3>"),
    popup_address = case_when(
      address != "" ~ paste0("<div><i>Addr: ", address,"</i></br></div>")
    ),
    popup_img1 = case_when(
      img != "" ~ paste0("<div> <img src='img/", img, "' style='max-width:290px;max-height:200px'></div>")),
    popup_img2 = case_when(
      img_2 != "" ~ paste0("<div> <img src='img/", img_2, "' style='max-width:290px;max-height:200px'></div>"),
      TRUE ~""),
    popup_text = case_when(
      text != "" ~ paste0("<div><p style='overflow-y: scroll;max-height: 250px;'>", text, "</p></div>"),
    ),
    popup_audio1 = case_when(
      audio != "" ~ paste0("<div><audio controls><source src='audio/", audio, "' type='audio/mpeg'> Your browser does not support the audio element</audio></div>"),
    ),
    popup_audio2 = case_when(
      audio_2 != "" ~ paste0("<div><audio controls><source src='audio/", audio_2, "' type='audio/mpeg'> Your browser does not support the audio element</audio></div>"),
    ),
    popup_audio3 = case_when(
      audio_3 != "" ~ paste0("<div><audio controls><source src='audio/", audio_3, "' type='audio/mpeg'> Your browser does not support the audio element</audio></div>")),
    popup_img = case_when(
      img != "" ~ paste0("<div style='max-height:203px;display:flex;overflow-x:scroll;overflow-y:hidden'>", 
                       popup_img1,
                       popup_img2,
                       "</div>"))) %>% 
  unite("popup_full", c(popup_url,
      popup_address,
      popup_img,
      popup_text,
      popup_audio1,
      popup_audio2,
      popup_audio3), sep=" ", remove = FALSE, na.rm = TRUE) %>% 
  mutate(popup_full = paste0("<div style='overflow:hidden'>", popup_full, "</div>"))
      

# df$img[df$img == ""] <- "blank.png"   

df$category <- as.factor(df$category)

# place <- photon::geocode(df$address, limit = 1, key = "place") 
# place$id <- rownames(place)

col_green <- "#258001"
col_purple <- "#9b009a"
col_blue <- "#00407A"
```

```{r}
getColor <- function(df) {
  sapply(df$category, function(category) {
  if(category == "Organisations") {
    "green"
  } else if(category == "Other") {
    "blue"
  } else {
    "purple"
  } })
}

icons <- awesomeIcons(
  icon = 'ios-close',
  iconColor = 'black',
  library = 'ion',
  markerColor = getColor(df)
)

# Colors for circle markers.
pal <- colorFactor(c(col_green, col_purple), 
                   domain = c("Organisations", "Meeting Places"))

popup_content <- paste0(
      "<h3><a href='", df$url,"' target='_blank'>", df$name, "</a></h5>",
      if(df$address != ""){paste0("<div><p>Addr: ", df$address,"</p></div>")},
      if(df$img != ""){paste0("<div> <img src='img/", df$img, "' style='max-width:300px'></div>")},
      "<div><p style='overflow-y: scroll;max-height: 250px;'>", df$text, "</p></div>",
      if(df$img_2 != ""){paste0("<div> <img src='img/", df$img_2, "' style='max-width:300px'></div>")},
      if(df$audio != ""){paste0("<div><audio controls><source src='audio/", df$audio, "' type='audio/mpeg'> Your browser does not support the audio element</audio></div>")})



map <- leaflet(df) %>% 
  addProviderTiles("CartoDB.Positron", group = "Positron", 
                   layerId = "basetile") %>% 
  addProviderTiles(providers$Stamen.Toner, group = "Toner") %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$Stamen.TonerLite, group = "Toner Lite") %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Voyager, group = "Voyager") %>% 
  addProviderTiles(providers$Esri.WorldImagery, group = "ESRI World Imagery",
                   options = providerTileOptions(opacity = 0.5)) %>% 
  addCircleMarkers(
    radius = 10,
    color = ~pal(category),
    stroke = FALSE, fillOpacity = 0.5,
    popup = ~popup_full,
    label = ~name
  ) %>% 
  # Adds controls
  addFullscreenControl() %>% 
  addLayersControl(
    baseGroups = c("Toner", "Toner Lite", "Positron", "Voyager", "ESRI World Imagery"),
    # overlayGroups = groups,
    options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = TRUE)
  ) %>% 
  addLegend("bottomleft",
    colors =c(col_green, col_purple),
    labels= c("Meeting Places", "Organisations"),
    title= "Type of marker",
    opacity = 1)  %>%
  addMiniMap(
    tiles = providers$CartoDB.Positron,
    toggleDisplay = TRUE ) 


map 

saveWidget(map, file = "alternative_trails_map_standalone.html")
```
